short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ESG Index by Protect US allows you to see the political spending rating of a company when shopping online!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ESG Index by Protect US allows you to see the political spending, sustainability, labor practices, etc... of a company when shopping online, allowing you to make decisions that are aligned with your values!

*Currently compatible with the following websites:
              Amazon

Current Ratings:
Political Involvement
        - Total amount spent on federal lobbying and political donations as a percentage of sales
        - A "0" means the company spends nothing on federal lobbying and political donations and a "5" means that they are the highest corporate spender on federal lobbying and political donations
